name: Super Soccer - World Champion 8 Bit Soccer Ball Juggling Free Sports Game
name_original: Super Soccer - World Champion 8 Bit Soccer Ball Juggling Free Sports Game
description:
Do you love soccer? Do you love retro 8 bit NES classics? Do you have what it takes to win the 2014 soccer world championship? Then try the Super Soccer - World Champion 8 Bit Soccer Ball Juggling Sports Game!

This radical game has the ultimate soccer juggling moves! Pull them off with great timing and a simple tap mechanic. Depending when you tap and where the ball is, you can pull off a fresh outside kick, an awesome head nod, or sweet inside kick. Keep the soccer ball in the air the longest to win!

Compete with others worldwide to be the best at soccer juggling! Leader boards and achievements available. This is not just for Brazil, but the whole world! You can do it!

Features:
* The best classic 8-bit graphics!
* Sweet retro sounds and music!
* Fresh moves and awesome style!
* Simple tap mechanics that are easy pick up, but hard to master!
* World champion leader boards and achievements!
